VMHaus is now an LIR with the recent membership we obtained from APNIC. As a value-added service to our customers, we are now providing free ASN Registration service for those who maintain $30 worth of servers monthly with us. 

Our Los Angeles are inside Quadranet's brand new Century location. Quadranet's network includes GTT, PCCW, Cogent, Telia, Zayo, Hostnet and they peer directly with Google, HiNet, Any2 & Equinix.

Hardware in Los Angeles includes Dual E5-2670 boxes with 128GB RAM backed by 1TB Samsung SSDs in RAID 10, providing that extra performance. With network provided by dual routers and switches and all hardware using dual PSU.

Our London Virtual Machines are inside @Clouvider’s new Telehouse North 2 data centre. The Clouvider network vastly improves our connectivity in London including direct peering with Liberty Global (Virgin Media, UPC, Aorta and more) with direct and recently upgraded ports to LINX 1 & 2 (which allows us to peer with BT, Sky, TalkTalk, Zen and more!) and uplinks include the usual (Level3, NTT, GTT, Telia, Cogent). 

As for our hardware in London we’ve gone with a brand spanking new Xeon E3-1270 v6 which clocks in at 3.8GHz with a nice little boost to 4.2GHz. We've also added 64GB of ECC DDR4 RAM for good measure finally backed by our 1TB Samsung NVMe disks which give your applications that little push to run faster.

We also support IPv4 and IPv6 BGP sessions.
